Feats-Skill-Performance -- Female Half-Elf Bard: 2

Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light

Languages: Common; Gnomish; Sylvan; Undercommon
Skill Notes:
Bard Skills: Skill Trained (Occultism; Performance; Choose 6 from any)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +2 Language Count
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Fascinating Performance: May fascinate 4 targets for 1 rd with a successful Performance vs. Will
Impressive Performance: May use Performance to Make an Impression
Legendary Performer: NPCs' successful DC 10 Society check to Recall Knowledge improves their attitude by 1 step/Earn Income using Performance increases audience by 2 levels
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Virtuosic Performer: +1 checks on chosen Performance type
Combat
Hit Points: 26 Armor Class: 16 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: None Shield: None
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Save: Fortitude: +5 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +6 (dexterity; trained); Will: +8 (wisdom; expert)
Magic
Spell Slots: O0: 5; O1: 3 Focus Points: 2 Attack: Occult: +6 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Occult: 16 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Counter Performance (O1 Enc): (R) Allies in a 60' radius may substitute caster Performance roll for save
Inspire Courage (O0 Enc): (1) 60' emanation gives +1 attack, damage, and saves vs. fear for 1 rd
Lingering Composition (O1 Enc): (F) Allows a Performance check to increase the duration of a subsequent cantrip composition to 3 rd (critical success 4 rd; no loss of Focus Point on failure)
Soothe (O1 Enc): (2) R30' Target regains 1d10+4 HP and gains +2 saves vs. mental effects for 1 min (heightened +1 +1d10+4 HP)
Magic Notes:
Composition Spells: Has a focus pool with 1 Focus Point/Knows the Counter Performance and Inspire Courage spells
Lingering Composition: Knows the Lingering Composition spell/+1 Focus Points
Maestro: Knows the Soothe spell
Occult Spellcasting: May learn spells from the occult tradition
Cantrip Expansion: May prepare two additional cantrips each day
Notes
Validation Errors:
General And Skill Feat Allocation: 1 available vs. 4 allocated
Legendary Performer Feat: Requires level (currently 2) >= 15, performance rank (currently 2) >= 4 and virtuosic performer feature (currently 1)
